title: Jane Fonda's Workout: Low Impact Aerobics
brief_description: The video is a low impact aerobics class designed to teach your body to burn fat, improve your cardiovascular fitness, muscle strength and flexibility. The class is taken by Jane Fonda and was conceived in consultation with Dr. James Garrick, Director of the Dance and Sports Medicine Centre at St. Francis Hospital, San Francisco.
